english.segment1: Hail Jesus! You're my King!. Your life frees me to sing. I will praise You all my days. You're perfect in all Your ways
english.segment2: Hail Jesus! You're my Lord!. I will obey Your word. Because I want to see. Your kingdom come. Not my will by Yours be done
english.segment3: Glory, glory to the Lamb!. You will take us into the land. We will conquer in Your name. And proclaim that "Jesus reigns!"
english.segment4: Hail, hail Lion of Judah!. How wonderful You are!. Hail, hail Lion of Judah!. How powerful You are!
english.segment5: Hail Jesus! You're my King!. Your life frees me to sing. I will praise You all my days. You're perfect in all Your ways
english.segment6: Glory, glory to the Lamb!. You will take us into the land. We will conquer in Your name. And proclaim that "Jesus reigns!
english.segment7: Hail, hail Lion of Judah!. How wonderful You are!. Hail, hail Lion of Judah!. How powerful You are!
english.segment8: He's the Lion in the tribe of Judah. He's the root and the Offspring of David. He's the Lily of the Valley. He's the Bright and the Morning Star
english.segment9: Hail, hail Lion of Judah!. How wonderful You are!. Hail, hail Lion of Judah!. How powerful You are!
english.segment10: The Lion of Judah shall break every chain. and give to us, oh my, the victory again and again. The Lion of Judah. shall break every chain and give to us, the victory again and again
